nodes.text: The position of Mandalorian Armorer was held by a Mandalorian tasked with forging armor and gear out of beskar metal. One armorer, who was known simply as "the Armorer," was part the Tribe on Nevarro after the Great Purge. She kept the tradition of the Mandalorian people alive by forging beskar, but she also reminded the Tribe to never remove their helmets in the presence of another, claiming this was the Way of the Mandalore. During the skirmish on Nevarro, after reminding him of Mandalorian Creed, she tasked Din Djarin with bringing Grogu to the Jedi Order.
